title: Colleen's chicken liver pate
ingredients: ['450g chicken livers', '240ml milk', '8 tablespoons cold unsalted butter, divided', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorns, divided', '2 cloves garlic, smashed', '1 teaspoon chili flakes', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '2 bay leaves', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons whiskey or brandy']
